about_the_game:
Play for 1-4 people where you venture into a camp where your goal is to escape the place.

To escape, you'll need to increase your campfire's light by collecting logs, open doors using hidden keys, collect items such as a saw that will be used to cut a tree and take the item from its interior as well as to stun a zombie for some time, but remember sure zombies are zombies, they revive!

There are also useless items that will serve you to have to drop a good item and in the end not serve and occupy your inventory

but, to make your mission more difficult, one player will be a zombie and will have the objective of turning the others into zombies. when the zombie finds its victim, the victim will also become a zombie

This game is not easy to clear all levels, imagine clearing 100% of the achievements
detailed_description:
Play for 1-4 people where you venture into a camp where your goal is to escape the place.

To escape, you'll need to increase your campfire's light by collecting logs, open doors using hidden keys, collect items such as a saw that will be used to cut a tree and take the item from its interior as well as to stun a zombie for some time, but remember sure zombies are zombies, they revive!

There are also useless items that will serve you to have to drop a good item and in the end not serve and occupy your inventory

but, to make your mission more difficult, one player will be a zombie and will have the objective of turning the others into zombies. when the zombie finds its victim, the victim will also become a zombie

This game is not easy to clear all levels, imagine clearing 100% of the achievements
name: Camping

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Survive and RUN... Survive a massacre at the camp as you grab keys and logs to get out and increase the explorable area Can you Beat the game in the hardest difficulty and unlock 100% of all the achivements
